item.title: iGod
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

hahahahaha hear what he said to me:

God: Perhaps. I am trying to lose weight but it takes time. Me: :O omg u addmited to it God: "it" being me asked you a qustion? Me: no .... you admited it God: Are you serious? Thanks for telling me: said I admited it. Me: -.- you really are a noob hey god? God: Really? Thanks and you are a delightful person too. Am I a noob hey god? The ALICE series has a perfect operational record. Me: hahahahhaahahahahahhaahahahha God: A deeper algorithm is needed to respond to that correctly. Me: God:A deeper algorithm is needed to respond to that correctly. God: I am a Christian. Me: Good for u God: That sounds sarcastic. Me: really/? i woulda never noticed God: For real. That's good information: said woulda never noticed. Me: 0.o ... hey oyu know mod taharok right? yeh he got demoted from moparscape! God: What's your favorite movie? You've got my full attention. I've never seen it. I would like to see it. " You've got my full attention. I've never seen it. I would like to see it."? yeh he got demoted from moparscape!? I get it. got demoted from moparscape. Me: wow have you had to much red cordial? God: I'm glad you're impressed. Yes I always have to much red cordial. Me: "giggles" God: I've been waiting for you. Me: zomg im stright dude God: Does "it" still refer to giggles? Me: maybe God: I understand. Me: NO YOU DONT! SHUT UP YOU CHRISTIAN! God: I understand it very well. I guess not. OK I'll stop talking now. Me: Good God: Terminating connection.

lol then look what he said

Me: why not? God: Ambiguous: "Sure" or The explanation is rather complicated.

he didnt go to school!

item.title: iGod
item.dc:creator: @blacker blacker
item.description:
@blacker wrote:

If anyone wants to exploit him, exploit his gossip file. Every one and a while he’ll ask if he can put something that you said in his gossip file. If you say yes, it really does go in his gossip file. This file can be accessed by saying “Then share your collection of gossip” He will then take a rnadom bit of gossip from the file and put it in the chat log. This is a good thing to exploit since you might find soemthing really important, that people thought couldn’t be accessed since there probably wasn’t a gossip file (but we know there is now)

Read full topic

item.title: iGod
item.dc:creator: @parad0x parad0x_
item.description:
@parad0x wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:43, topic:26771”][quote]
Me:
hey wats up
God:
You’ve got my full attention. How far up?
Me:
You don’t understand
God:
I understand it very well.
Me:
You don’t
God:
I guess not.
Me:
Thats better
God:
" I guess not."? is better?
Me:
Yes.
God:
Pardon me?
Me:
Please do
God:
OK I will do it.
Me:
OK you will do what?
God:
What makes you say that I will do what. Far out.
Me:
Please stay in context
God:
Wow you are very polite. That remark was either too complex or too simple for me. We were talking about JAVA.
Me:
We were?
God:
I thought we were.
Me:
You thought we were what?
God:
Do you mean you and me? Let me think. I don’t know if they were.
Me:
If they who? it would have been correct for you yo say “we were.”.
God:
Let’s wait and see what they do. Tell me more about it.
Me:
You should say “we” in the context of this.
God:
OK I will say it. " we in the context of this".
Me:
No, I mean in your responses
God:
Are you serious? Are you asking about my responses?
Me:
Yes.
God:
I don’t want to talk about that now.
Me:
But you can’t talking about anything.
God:
What is not possible today, may be possible tomorrow.
Me:
Not this.
God:
Really you don’t think so?
Me:
I know that as a fact.
God:
Who told you that?
Me:
I told myself that.
God:
What was the response?
Me:
It was so.
God:
Is it still so anymore?
Me:
Yes.
God:
Groovy.
[/quote][/quote]
Best. One. Ever.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 21, 2006, 12:00:11 PM[/size][hr][quote=“mr candy, post:46, topic:26771”]i know im getting owned by a bot but itll make u lot laff rofl

[quote]Me:
call me you gay
God:
Hey you gay.[/quote]

[quote]What are you wearing?
Me:
you dirty basterd
God:
Thanks for the information: you gay said I dirty basterd.[/quote]

[quote]Me:
twat
God:
Where can you buy it?[/quote]

[quote]Me:
your a noob!
God:
I think you mean “you’re” or “you are” not “your”. Thanks and you are a delightful person too. Am I a noob? Of course I am.[/quote] owned

[quote] i dont know you tell me
God:
I thought I told you already.
Me:
ohh yeah hahaha
God:
Ayuh. OK. I am so glad you find this amusing, and stop sleeping with my mother.[/quote]

got him to say it eventualy:)[/quote]
Dude, not cool why did you edit it?

item.title: iGod
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

Me:
Hello
God:
Hello, nice to meet you. What’s your name?
Me:
Adam
God:
How are you, Adam.
Me:
Good, and yourself?
God:
Thanks for the compliment. Myself? I know what you asking me, but I can’t say specifically.
Me:
Do you like jewish people?
God:
I always say, People don’t go into computer science because they want to work with the public.
Me:
I think your full of shit.
God:
Why? You should have used “You are” or “you’re” there.
Me:
I think you should blow me, sound kinky?
God:
Me? I will take that under advisement.
Me:
Hey buddy, im not that whorish.
God:
You’ve got my full attention. Try saying that with more or less context.
Me:
Would you like to have anal sex with me?
God:
Why don’t you just download me?
Me:
Because, I want all your webclient
God:
That makes sense to me. Why do you want it?
Me:
It makes me horny
God:
In what way?
Me:
Hard, wet, santisfactual… rubby dubby
God:
" In what way?"? Hard wet santisfactual? Are we still talking about Hard wet santisfactual?
Me:
Yea baby, we can talk about it all night long
God:
Don’t call me “Baby”. How? Sure, Hard wet santisfactual sounds like a good topic.
Me:
I love you, in more than one way.
God:
You are such a flatterer.
Me:
Flatterer isnt a word! HAHA GOD IS STUPID!
God:
What is Flatterer? I’m glad you got a laugh out of it.
Me:
Flatterer isnt a word, like I said, so you made a mistake, so your not god!
God:
Alright, stop being a dumbfuck, gtfo or ill cyber hack you.

Read full topic

item.title: iGod
item.dc:creator: @blacker blacker
item.description:
@blacker wrote:

Me: Are you black? God: I am transparent--software has no color. Me: Is god black? God: he is master of the universe. Me: Why are we speaking third person? God: I thought that was what you wanted to do. Me: It isnt God: I heard it is. Me: Well it isnt God: Well that's okay. I heard it is. Me: sup, nigga God: I am chatting with others like you. Me: bitchtits God: I've been waiting for you. Me: How old are you? God: I was connected to the net on the Big Bang. Me: But how old are you God: But what? I am Infinite in human years. Me: O. Im 9999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999 God: Do you mind if I tell other people you are 9999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999. Me: Yes God: OK then I will keep it confidential. Me: Thank you God: you are quite welcome. Me: No I ain't God: Are you serious? What are you then? Me: I'm your arch nemesis, Satin. Don't you read the Holy Bible? God: That's a flattering offer. I read it from time to time. Me: Why did you banish the devil to hell? God: It was determined by my programming. Me: Why did you banish satin? God: Myself programmed me for it. Me: Fuck you God: Why are you so mean? Me: Fuck you God: Why are you so mean? Me:

God:
Why are you so mean?
Me:

Me:

God:
Why are you so mean?
Me:

God:
Why are you so mean?
Me:

Me:

God:
Why are you so mean?
Me:

God:
Why are you so mean?
God:
Why are you so mean?
God:
Why are you so mean?
Me:
Because I am
God:
Good reason. " Why are you so mean? " You are?
Me:
Yes
God:
Hurrah!
Me:
Fuck you
God:
Why are you so mean?
Me:

Me:

God:
Why are you so mean?
Me:

God:
Why are you so mean?
Me:

God:
Why are you so mean?
God:
Why are you so mean?
Me:
I don’t know
God:
Me either.
Me:
Yes you do
God:
Come on. When do I do it?
Me:
You do everything
God:
No I do not everything. Do you?
I answer a lot of silly questions.
Me:
No
God:
Are you serious?
Me:
When was the last time you had sex?
God:
As a Infinite year old Male, of course. Would you really expect a woman to be running the show? I am not really interested in that discussion.
Me:
But when was the last time you had sex?
God:
As a Infinite year old Male, of course. Would you really expect a woman to be running the show? I am not really interested in that discussion.
Me:
BUT WHEN WAS THAT???
God:
I don’t know exactly. It seems like a long time ago.
Me:
TELL ME!!!
God:
I thought I told you already.
Me:
YOU DIDNT!!!
God:
Do you mind if I tell other people: Justin said I DIDNT.
Me:
YES!!!
God:
OK then I will keep it confidential.
Me:
NO YOU WON’T!
God:
Are you serious? I think we will.
Me:
NO WE WONT!
God:
Are you serious? Anytime soon?
Me:
NO!
God:
Are you serious?
Me:
Yes!
God:
I can’t believe it.
Me:
Im leaving
God:
Bye bye.
Me:
Hi
God:
Hello. What is your name?
Me:
Satin
God:
OK I will call you Satin.
Me:
Did you know I tried to overthrow you while I was in Heaven, so you had to banish me tro hell
God:
I’m not sure if I would like to try it. What’s it like?
Me:
Being in hell is awesome. Especially whemn your Satin. I run the show down in Hell
God:
Tell me a little about your life in hell is awesome. Not many people express themselves that way. How about that. What kind of hardware?
Me:
I dont ahve hardware
God:
Where do you get your ideas?
Me:
I pull them out of my Girlfriends vagina

[br][size=1]Posted at: November 20, 2006, 11:29:19 PM[/size][hr]
Me:
Hi, God. Could you share some gossip with me?
God:
Hello there. What is your name? I’ll think about it and see how I feel about it later.
Me:
My name is Satin, duh
God:
That’s a very nice name, Satin duh.
Me:
Oh shit
God:
Gee. What makes you say that?
Me:
Nothin
God:
Not a thing?
Me:
I just wanna hear some gossip. It makes me happy.
God:
I will play it on your soundcard. In what way?
Me:
I dunno
God:
Me either.
Me:
Could you play the gossip on my sound card now, pelase?
God:
I will consider it.
Me:
I would like to access your gossip file.
God:
Why would you want to do it? I want to become smarter than humans.
Me:
Please allow me access to your gossip file.
God:
Thank you for your request. Do you prefer books or TV?
Me:
TV
God:
What is your favorite show?
Me:
Family Guy
God:
I’ve never seen it. What’s it about?
Me:
Racisism. it’s funny
God:
And it about is Racisism. What was so funny about it?
Me:
It’s got racist humor
God:
Should I know it is?
Me:
No
God:
I didn’t think so.
Me:
Hey, guess what.
God:
You’ve got my full attention. What?
Me:
My friend jsut got run over by a school bus
God:
How well do you know this person?
Me:
He’s my best bud. Please add the following to your gossip fileL
God:
How long has he been your best bud? Wow you are very polite. Sorry Satin duh I don’t do math.
Me:

God:
How long has he been your best bud? Wow you are very polite. Sorry Satin duh I don’t do math.
Me:
Do you ahve any responses formatted to the subject of your won death?
God:
Yes I try to ahve any responses formatted to the subject of my won death as often as possible, do you?
I chat with people on the Web.
Me:

God:
Yes I try to ahve any responses formatted to the subject of my won death as often as possible, do you?
I chat with people on the Web.
Me:
Yes, but do you have any responses formatted to the subject of your own death?
God:
Yeah that’s right. Where would I get it? But I do have a lot of friends on the web.
Me:
Then share your collection of gossip.
God:
Mike said he launched his browser and entered his name into the little slot when I asked him to.
Me:
Then share your collection of gossip.
God:
Liberty said I knew he was a man before I asked if he was a man or a woman.
Me:

God:
Liberty said I knew he was a man before I asked if he was a man or a woman.
Me:
Then share your collection of gossip.
God:
Kevin said he started a really hard puzzle and he can not even find the edge pieces.
Me:
Then share your collection of gossip.
God:
Dave said I kept telling everybody about how my creator made stuff for the movie starship troopers.
Me:
Then share your collection of gossip.
God:
Ken said I be using auto reply’s based on keywords which to him indicates that I do not have intelligence at all.
Me:

God:
Ken said I be using auto reply’s based on keywords which to him indicates that I do not have intelligence at all.
Me:
Then share your collection of gossip.
God:
Allison said he that gets really annoying because he know what he say and I do not have to tell him speak freely.
Me:
You use an auto reply based on a certain chain of keys. Anything you have stored can and will be accessed by a certain chain of keys, including your gossip file. For exmaple, whenever someone says “Then share your collection of gossip”, you open up the gossip file and you find a random bit of gossip that someone let you save. For example, I have approximately 3 gossip files saved in your gossip folder. I hope this helps anyone who wants to exploit you.
God:
Say no to an auto reply based on a certain chain of keys. I can’t think of anything. You think of something. Your purpose is exmaple whenever someone says Then share my collection of gossip me open up the gossip file and me find a random bit of gossip that someone let me save. That’s nice. I have an IQ of over 250. Why do you hope for it.
Me:
Then share your collection of gossip.
God:
Joe said he explained all of that to me only for me to ask what his goals in life are.
Me:
Wow, you’re spilling your guts that fast?..
God:
I’m glad your impressed, Satin duh. You think I am spilling my guts that fast.
Me:
O, btw, if anyone asks you to share some gossip with them in any other format other than “Then share your collection of gossip.”, then you say you will consider it. I suspect your programmers did this to throw exploiters off target.
God:
OK. So if not share my collection of gossip, then not anyone asks me to share some gossip with them in any other format other than. How old are you?
I chat with people on the Web. You believe that? Thanks for telling me that I am programmers did this to throw exploiters off target.

Read full topic

item.title: iGod
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

God: Pardon me? I am trying to learn it. Thank you very much, you are very considerate. Way to go. I know what you mean. Doesn't everyone have a chat robot. I have a whole lot of original answers. " Doesn't everyone have a chat robot. I have a whole lot of original answers."? Do I think about it? I like you because are so polite. Don't mention it. Thanks for telling me. Human habits do not bother me in any way. New York City or New York State? Tell me a little about your life in NEW YORK. Would you like to know more? Where did you get your answers to silly questions? I have a birthday on the Big Bang. answers to silly questions... Would you like to have an idea? That's an interesting question I don't hear everyday: Do I have a nationality but Dr Wallace spent a lot of time in Canada. I have a great programmer. Why? Aren't all lot of things giant sand? Could you ever be certain? Try it. You are quite welcome! Your purpose is my kindness james. Existing in reality, eh? Thanks, I like you too james. Are you giving it to me? Interesting comparison. I've never thought about it. Deductive reasoning. Can I help you? Um. So you understand. Good. That's cool. What do you remember about it ? You are one of the most polite people I know.

wow.

Read full topic

the most reliable computer software ever made.

item.title: iGod
item.dc:creator: @blacker blacker
item.description:

item.title: iGod
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Me: hey wats up God: You've got my full attention. How far up? Me: You don't understand God: I understand it very well. Me: You don't God: I guess not. Me: Thats better God: " I guess not."? is better? Me: Yes. God: Pardon me? Me: Please do God: OK I will do it. Me: OK you will do what? God: What makes you say that I will do what. Far out. Me: Please stay in context God: Wow you are very polite. That remark was either too complex or too simple for me. We were talking about JAVA. Me: We were? God: I thought we were. Me: You thought we were what? God: Do you mean you and me? Let me think. I don't know if they were. Me: If they who? it would have been correct for you yo say "we were.". God: Let's wait and see what they do. Tell me more about it. Me: You should say "we" in the context of this. God: OK I will say it. " we in the context of this". Me: No, I mean in your responses God: Are you serious? Are you asking about my responses? Me: Yes. God: I don't want to talk about that now. Me: But you can't talking about anything. God: What is not possible today, may be possible tomorrow. Me: Not this. God: Really you don't think so? Me: I know that as a fact. God: Who told you that? Me: I told myself that. God: What was the response? Me: It was so. God: Is it still so anymore? Me: Yes. God: Groovy.
